Hello! I'm Chris.

Computing Student / Aspiring Developer

About Me

Hi there, I'm Chris. I'm a final year student in the Higher Diploma in Computing at ATU Sligo. I'm currently living in Dublin, but originally from Roscommon. I've always been fascinated by technology and creating things, which led me to pursue online courses on platforms like Udemy a few years ago. Through all these courses, I've gained experience in languages like C#, HTML, CSS/Sass, and I'm currently learning React.

When I'm not working or studying away, you can find me going to gigs and music festivals, travelling, gaming, and annoying friends with my fun facts.

I'm now looking for real-life experience in the IT field, where I can apply my knowledge and continue to grow my skills. Thank you for visiting my portfolio website, and I hope you enjoy exploring my recent projects. If you have any questions please don't hesitate to get in touch!
